applicationLogic.conference
Class Conference

java.lang.Object
  applicationLogic.conference.Conference

public class Conference
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a data type which holds informations on a given conference. A conference is a set of proceedings. Each stored proceedings is ordered by its year. This class also provides a set of methods to handle parts of the conference and to and to extract some properties, as Authors-Publications and Publication-Authors histograms.

Author:
Staffiero

Constructor Detail

Conference

public Conference(dblp.social.hibernate.ISodaHibernateSession session,
                  java.lang.String conferenceName)
           throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
This constructor initializes the Conference object loading all the proceedings of the given conference. All the Proceedings are lazily fetched, i.e. relation fields will not be available without a further query to the database.

Parameters:
session - a SodaHibernateSession used to query the database.
conferenceName - the conference short name. For example icse, aamas, sigmod, ecc...
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

Conference

public Conference(dblp.social.hibernate.ISodaHibernateSession session,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> conferenceNames)
           throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
This constructor initializes the Conference object loading all the proceedings of the given conference. In this case the conference is represented by a set of strings, the first string of the list becomes the conference name. All the Proceedings are lazily fetched, i.e. relation fields will not be available without a further query to the database.

Parameters:
session - a SodaHibernateSession used to query the database.
conferenceNames - a set of short names representing the whole conference. For example, for aamas the set should be {"aamas", "atal","ecaiw"}
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

public void initializeYear(int year)

getAuthorsPublications

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublications()
                                                         throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing a histogram in which for a given number of co-authors we can find the respective number of publications. I.e. we can know how many publications are authored by a certain number of co-authors. The whole set of publications and authors of the current conference is considered.

Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getPublicationsAuthors

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getPublicationsAuthors()
                                                         throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing a histogram in which for a given number of publications we can find the respective number of authors. I.e. we can know how many authors authored a certain number of publications. The whole set of publications and authors of the current conference is considered.

Returns:
a List of integer representing the Publications-Authors histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsPerYear

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublicationsPerYear(int year)
                                                                throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram considering only the given year.

Parameters:
year - the year of interest
Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsUntilYear

public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAuthorsPublicationsUntilYear(int year)
                                                                  throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram considering all the proceedings until the given year.

Parameters:
year - the year of interest
Returns:
a List of integer representing the Authors-Publications histogram.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

getAuthorsPublicationsNumber

public java.util.List<Author> getAuthorsPublicationsNumber()
                                                    throws dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException
Returns sorted array of authors. For each author the number of publications is set. All the publications of the current conference are considered, from the first to the last year.

Returns:
a List of Author sorted by publications number.
Throws:
dblp.social.exceptions.SodaHibernateException

groupByYear

private void groupByYear(java.util.List<dblp.social.hibernate.entities.Proceedings> procs)
Groups all the given proceedings by their year. The result is stored in an HashMap whose key is the year and whose value is an ArrayList of Proceedings.

Parameters:
procs - the list of proceedings to be grouped

parseYear

private java.lang.String parseYear(java.lang.String s)
Extracts the year from the proceedings id. This is necessary because the field year may be different from the actual proceedings year.

Parameters:
s - the proceedings id
Returns:
a string containing the year in (four digits)

yearExists

private boolean yearExists(int year)
Checks if a year exists in which this conference had held.

Parameters:
year - the year to check
Returns:
true if the conference had held in the given year, false otherwise.
